name: Leaves of Fortune
description:
A collaborative project between Alec, Melva and Hanine for Code Coven's IGM Crystal Cohort, assignment 5.

Rilla thinks living upside down is the norm… after all, that’s all she’s ever known. She heads to work everyday to pick tea leaves and deliver them to the teahouse. Between the leaves, Rilla finds sweet fortune strips that she collects.
